jld.title: Enhance Your Profile With Our Justia Connect Pro Badge
description: When you upgrade your free Justia Connect Basic Membership to Justia Connect Pro, you unlock the exclusive, eye-catching Justia Connect Pro Badge for your profile in the Justia Lawyer Directory! Plus, Pros get access to additional membership benefits, such as the ability to choose featured reviews for your Justia Profile and CLE courses.
